title: Pano Installer
welcome-description: Before you can start using the Pano, you need to fill in some information.

website.title: Website Settings
website.description: The title and description of your site will appear in search engines. You can use these more and then you can edit it in the administration panel.

database.title: Database
database.description: Enter database information so that the Pano can store and process data.
database.help-link-text: How do I find out my database information?

email.title: E-Mail Settings
email.description: The Pano requires an email provider to be able to send emails. Please register the email address you wish to use with your login credentials on the platform.

account.title: Account
account.description: You need an administrator account to manage the Pano.
